dcterms:creator: B. M. Lake
R. Salakhutdinov
J. B. Tenenbaum
dcterms:description: Mini-ImageNet is created by randomly sampling 100 classes from ImageNet and selecting 600 examples for each class. The training set has 38,400 images with 64 classes, the test set consists of 12,000 images with 20 classes, and the validation set contains 9,600 images with 16 classes.
dcterms:title: Mini-ImageNet

dcterms:creator: A. Santoro
S. Bartunov
M. Botvinick
dcterms:description: Omniglot consists of 1,623 characters from 50 different alphabets. The dataset is augmented with rotations by multiples of 90 degrees, and 1,200 characters are randomly selected for training while the remaining character classes are used for testing.
dcterms:title: Omniglot
